PIDRoute Struct Reference

Identifies where a PID should be sent. Each bit in the DestinationMask corresponds to an entry in the destination list. A bit value of 0 means the PID does not go to the corresponding destination; while a 1 means it does. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

WORD PID
 The PID value.
WORD DestinationMask
 The destination mask; msb refers to destination index 0, lsb refers to destination index 15.

Detailed Description

Identifies where a PID should be sent. Each bit in the DestinationMask corresponds to an entry in the destination list. A bit value of 0 means the PID does not go to the corresponding destination; while a 1 means it does.

Member Data Documentation

WORD PIDRoute::PID

The PID value.

WORD PIDRoute::DestinationMask

The destination mask; msb refers to destination index 0, lsb refers to destination index 15.
